body_text: You're passing childPrefName instead of realPrefName, so instead of asking for, say, "browser.chromeURL", you're asking for ".browser.chromeURL", which doesn't exist.
body: You're passing `childPrefName` instead of `realPrefName`, so instead of asking for, say, "browser.chromeURL", you're asking for ".browser.chromeURL", which doesn't exist.
body_html: You're passing childPrefName instead of realPrefName, so instead of asking for, say, "browser.chromeURL", you're asking for ".browser.chromeURL", which doesn't exist.
